LIVE, LEARN AND CONNECT AT UTM
==============================

UTM is committed to provide the best academic, research and outreach programs to enhance your life and prepares students to meet challenges and embrace the opportunities they will encounter in today’s interdependent world. We are proud to welcome you to UTM and look forward to helping you thrive in our beautiful campus and world-class university.

**How to apply for a programme with UTM**
-----------------------------------------

Watch our comprehensive step-by step tutorial video that guides you through the entire application process.

[](https://admission.utm.my/#)

![](https://admission.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/461/2022/03/AdobeStock_85155825-scaled.jpeg "Asian male and female students reading at library")

UNDERGRADUATE ADMISSION
=======================

Visit the Undergraduate Admission website for more information about undergraduate programs, admission requirements and how to submit your application.

[Admission For Malaysian](https://admission.utm.my/undergraduate-malaysian/)

[Admission For International](https://admission.utm.my/undergraduate-international/)

POSTGRADUATE ADMISSION
======================

We prepare graduate students for distinguished careers, and students from all disciplines and backgrounds are encouraged to apply to our Postgraduate programmes.

[Admission For Malaysian](https://admission.utm.my/malaysian-postgraduate-study/)

[Admission For International](https://admission.utm.my/international-postgraduate-study/)

![](https://admission.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/461/2022/03/AdobeStock_324219448-scaled.jpeg "Online education. Group of students studying on computer")

ONLINE LEARNING
===============

We are committed to ensuring that your online learning experience is enriching and engaging. All learning activities have clear objectives, are driven by inquiry and practical learning, and are supported through innovative technologies.

[See more details here](https://admission.utm.my/odl/)

**Why study with UTM?**
=======================

Intensely curious and driven to explore, the people of UTM value rigorous analytical thinking, ingenuity, hands-on problem solving, and big new ideas. Stimulating, supportive, and playful, the UTM community becomes, for many students, a second home.



#### Top Ranking University

Top 1% in Engineering Technology; Top 25 Under 50 years in QS World  University Ranking 



#### Research University

Awarded the Most Number of Higher Institution Research Centres of Excellence (4 National HICoEs)



#### University Accreditation

Self-Accreditation & 100% Board of Engineers (BEM)-Accredited Programs



#### Green Eco-Tourism Campus

A environmental friendly practices and education combine to promote sustainable and eco-friendly practices in the campus
